sub_title: Programmamanager vluchtelingen, opvang en huisvesting bij de gemeente Eindhoven
summary: I am an ambitious, multidisciplinary senior advisor, manager and upcoming supervisory board member. I pride myself on achieving high quality results for organizations with clear society-focused missions. Deeply driven by purpose and people, I excel in vision and strategy, critical and out-of-the-box-thinking, inclusive management and networking. I thrive in high-paced, complex and international environments. With my analytical power, people skills, and permanent desire to learn and improve, I embrace challenges and strive for excellence in everything I do.

[{'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'role': 'Advisor', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'VluchtelingenWerk Oost Nederland (VWON)', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQF_UXEfusAcJA/company-logo_400_400/0/1649228381972?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=2IdTmN1QS4AjwRrSQeSmkprcl6nmA_Azf_OhOq6_YQE', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/vluchtelingenwerkoverijsselengelderland/'}, 'cause': 'CIVIL_RIGHTS', 'description': "Vluchtelingenwerk is the Netherlands' largest NGO for refugees, asylum seekers and status holders, guiding the integration and family-reunion process whilst providing legal, financial and administrative support.

I was responsible for:
• Providing tri-weekly open consultation hours to clarify or solve any issue at hand, working closely with immigration authorities, the municipality and other NGOs;
• Accompanied individuals and families during the entire integration process; ie. registration in the municipality, applying for social benefits, signing purchase contracts, etc."}, {'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'role': 'Team Leader', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'AIESEC', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQFNIFKL5h461A/company-logo_400_400/0/1628881223590?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=N9_Qw7UxPSG6gy1Yq3mVPyLeyST4NTtfmgkHToRAB54', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/aiesec/'}, 'cause': 'HUMANITARIAN_RELIEF', 'description': 'Project Kapatiran is a program in the slums of Manila training and educating communities about climate change and disaster preparedness.

I was responsible for:
• Coordinating the work in our group of five international students and managing the communication and interaction with NGOs, governmental institutions, AIESEC respresentatives and local students. 
• Preparing and hosting disaster preparedness seminars and trainings to locals in combination with other social work.

Following the project I spent six weeks solo-backpacking, mostly in the Philippines and Taiwan.'}, {'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'role': 'Head of Operations and Marketing, Vice-President, Account Manager, Editor-in-Chief', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Integrand', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEe7ha_0We7pQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1617268822416?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=Qz1_h06sCEKhhzLLTWtBTeDX-Xi6QR5pR8Yh5-wL8ws', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/integrand/'}, 'cause': None, 'description': '•	Responsible for the internal operations, including database management (MySQL) and business analysis, as well as B2B & student marketing to increase the amount of internships and the fulfillment thereof, for example through lecture presentations, flyer distribution coordination, social media campaigns, etc.

•	Vice-President: Chairing board meetings when President was absent.
